title: 有没有办法让相同属性存在一个装备上
author: 淑芳
txt_content: 如题所说，就是假如一个护符，能不能做到 既加10Hp上限又加5%HP上限

replies.author: 极光战神伍
replies.txt_content: 可行，测试版本1.12/give @p minecraft:diamond_boots 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:10.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health},{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:2,UUIDMost:2,Amount:0.05,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}]}复制代码只要保证UUID不同即可叠加相同属性
